list of non ferrous metals

Non-ferrous metal is to point to iron, chromium, manganese three other than all the metal metal. China in 1958, will be iron, chromium, manganese on black metal; And iron, chromium, manganese outside of the 64 kinds of metal on non-ferrous metal. The 64 kinds of nonferrous metals including: aluminum, magnesium, potassium, sodium, calcium, strontium, barium, copper, lead, zinc, tin, cobalt, nickel, antimony, mercury, cadmium, bismuth, gold, silver, platinum, ruthenium, rhodium, palladium, osmium tetroxide, iridium, beryllium, lithium, rb, cs, titanium, vanadium, zirconium, Ha, nb and ta, tungsten, molybdenum, indium, gallium, thallium, ge, phenium, la, ce, pr, nd, sm, eu, including gadolinium, TB, scandium-sodium iodides, ho, er, tm, Lu yb, tl, sc, y, silicon, boron, selenium, tellurium, arsenic, thorium.

Crystalline silicon solar cells

"Silicon" is the planet's most abundant amount of material storage of one. Since the nineteenth century, scientists have found crystalline silicon semiconductor characteristics, it almost changed everything, and even human thinking. Of the 20 th century, our life everywhere "silicon" figure and the function, crystalline silicon solar battery is nearly 15 years form industrialization the fastest. The production process can be divided into five steps: a, b, purification process pull rods process c, slice process d, the battery process e, packaging process.
At present, crystalline silicon materials (including polycrystalline and monocrystalline silicon) is the main photovoltaic material, its market share in 90% above, and in the next a long time also is still the mainstream of solar cells material. Polycrystalline silicon production technology for a long time is in the U.S., Japan, Germany, etc. Of the three countries seven company 10 factories, forming technology blockade, hand the condition of the market monopoly. The demand of polysilicon mainly comes from the semiconductor and solar cells. According to the different requirements for purity, divided into electronic level and the sun energy level. Among them, used in electronic level of about 55%, the sun polysilicon polysilicon accounted for 45%, with energy photovoltaic industry in the rapid development of polycrystalline silicon solar cells, and the speed of growth in the demand for higher than the development of semiconductor polysilicon, predicts 2008 solar polycrystalline silicon the demand for more than electronic level polycrystalline silicon. In 1994 the world solar cells, the total output of only 69 MW and 2004 years of close to 1200 MW, in just 10 years will increase in 17 times. Experts predict solar pv industry in the first half of the 21 st century will more than nuclear power as the most important foundation energy one.
Amorphous solar battery is divided into monocrystalline silicon solar energy cell and polycrystalline silicon solar cells.
(1) monocrystalline silicon solar cells
Monocrystalline silicon solar energy cell photoelectric conversion efficiency is about 15%, the highest reached 24%, which is now all kinds of solar cells photoelectric conversion efficiency of the highest, but to make cost is very big, so that it can't be extensive and widely used. Because of monocrystalline silicon generally USES toughened glass and waterproof resin, so encapsulate the durable, service life up to 15 years, general maximum of 25 years.
(2) polycrystalline silicon solar cells
Polycrystalline silicon solar cell production process and monocrystalline silicon solar battery, but almost polycrystalline silicon solar photoelectric conversion efficiency is to reduce many, the photoelectric conversion efficiency about 12% (on July 1, 2004 Japan sharp listed for 14.8% of the world's highest efficiency efficiency polycrystalline silicon solar energy cell). From the cost of making terms, than monocrystalline silicon solar energy cell to cheaper, materials manufacturing is simple, save electricity consumption, the production cost is low, so to get a large development. In addition, the use of polycrystalline silicon solar energy cell life expectancy than monocrystalline silicon solar energy cell short. From the performance to price terms, monocrystalline silicon solar battery also slightly better.

What is the main use of indium

Main purpose: coating of indium used in flat panel displays, information materials, high-temperature superconducting materials, integrated circuits, a special solder, high-performance alloys and defense, pharmaceutical, high-purity reagents and many other high-tech fields, high value-added products, such as: LCD TV, solar cells, air bearings and engine bearings, high-tech weapons and other products without indium.

angle steel for sale,angle steel manufacturers

According to the structure of the different angle steelcan be composed of the stress of the different need component, could also be the fittings between components. Widely used in all kinds of architecture and engineering structure, such as the building, Bridges, transmission tower, lifting transportation machinery, the ships, the industrial furnace, supply, container frame and warehouse shelves, etc.
angle steel of building use carbon structural steel, is simple sections of steel, steel is mainly used for metal components and the frame of the workshop etc. In use requirement has good weldability, plastic deformation properties and some mechanical strength. The raw materials for the production of Angle steel billet low carbon steel billet and the finished product for party hot rolling forming, is fire or hot rolling state delivery.

Polyurethane Enameled Copper Round Wire for Relay Applicati

This wire has baked varnish insulation mainly on modified polyurethane resin over its copper round conductor together.

Features: Excellent consistency of the conductor resistance, the insulating layer thickness consistency Excellent High Solt-fill a few pinpricks Suitable for high-speed winding equipment ....

Applicable Standard: JIS C 3202.6 IEC60317-20 ..
Typical applications: power relays, high frequency relay, time relay, automotive relays, telecom relays, Sealed relay.

Cupric Oxide use

USES: used as glass, ceramic, enamel of green, red or blue paint, optical glass polishing agent, oil desulfurizer, synthetic organic catalyst, manufacturing artificial stones and other copper oxide. Also can be used for gas analysis and manufacturing rayon, etc.
Cupric Oxideis a kind of amorphous black powder, the products in addition to fireworks outside still can be used glass and porcelain colorants, oil desulfurizer, organic synthesis catalyst, and for making rayon and gas analysis.

CAS NO. :7761-88-8

Molecular Formula: AgNO3

Molecular Weight: 169.87

Product Description:
Silver nitrate, also known as silver nitrate is a soluble chemical compound with chemical formula AgNO3. This compound is a versatile precursor to many other silver compounds, as used in photography. Comparatively, it is far less sensitive to light than the halides. It is caustic, because silver was called luna by the ancient alchemists.

Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode

Product name:Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode

Electrode:
Cell voltage: into the slot 1.9 - 2.1V out of the slot 3.4 - 3.9V
Current density: 80 - 150A/m2
Life: ?8 years

Description:As the MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode melted the titanium-manganese mixed powder with the high temperature and high vacuum in the form of invasion of infiltration of titanium eutectic matrix, it combined with a solid, mechanical strength, corrosion resistance and a good electrochemical activity.Products of manganese dioxide adopted this electrode are of high quality. An electrode assembly can be used for multiple electrolysis. Do not have to sandblast, anti-electrolysis and any other treatment.

buy Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode

the use of Chloroauric acid

Chloroauric acidis a inorganic compound with the formula HAuCl4. It is commonly used as a precursor to gold (Au) in a variety of purposes. The term chloroauric acid is also sometimes used to describe other gold chlorides.
Chloroauric acid is used as the electrolyte in the Wohlwill process for refining gold.
Generally, colloidal gold and gold nanoparticles are produced in a solution ("liquid chemical methods" by reduction of chloroauric acid with trisodium citrate, although alternative methods exist, such as the Norrish reaction and the aldehyde reduction used in Angel gilding.

more about:buy Chloroauric acid

Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode preparat

In a vacuum furnace, pulse current to the load through the molybdenum boat in a number of manganese or manganese within the heating block, to obtain manganese vapor; with a titanium plate placed in a vacuum furnace heated by two-temperature, prompting manganese vapor adsorption on titanium, infiltration to the diffusion of Mn within the titanium layer; complete heat treatment, the plate with the furnace cooled down to room temperature, can be released. The invention of titanium anode plate prepared Ti-Mn surface layer of uniform permeability, resistance to passive ability, and plate products easy to peel, so saving energy, and this preparation method is not plate size restrictions for large anode plate preparation.

more about:

buy Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode preparation

Electrolytic MnO2 titanium base alloy coating anode

Antibodies and Antigens

In the human body, antibodies are released, all that perceives the body to fight as a foreign body. This can range from a splitter to cancer area. The specific antibodies that are released to fight infection is directly related to the type of infection present in the body. Some of the antibodies for the person who first fought the connection between the respective antibodies, and she named the infection.

Antibodies and antigens:

In order to understand the Forssman antibody, a simple explanation of antibodies and antigens is helpful. An antibody is a protein that is secreted by white blood cells in response to an antigen. An antigen is a substance that causes the body to produce antibodies. The antigen may be chemically, viral or environmental. The antibody has the task to attack the antigen and destroy it.
more about:

Antibodies
